Package com.esplibrary.packets

Class InfDisplayData

java.lang.Object
com.esplibrary.packets.ESPPacket
com.esplibrary.packets.InfDisplayData
public class InfDisplayData extends ESPPacket
Created by JDavis on 3/13/2016. InfDisplayData packet represents the all of the necessary information needed to rebuild the Valentine One's front display. The data includes: the bogey counter 7 segment image 1 amp; image 2, the signal strength bar graph image, band and arrow indicator image 1 amp; 2, as well as three aux bytes.

  • Field Details

    • V1MODE_UNKNOWN

      public static final byte V1MODE_UNKNOWN
      Invalid V1 mode
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • V1MODE_ALL_BOGEY_OR_K_AND_KA

      public static final byte V1MODE_ALL_BOGEY_OR_K_AND_KA
      'All Bogey Mode' if V1 in USA mode. 'U' mode or 'C' Mode if V1 in Euro Mode. 
       Usa Operation (Default):
 - All Bogeys Mode

 European Operation:
 - 'U' Mode - K and Ka(Photo)
 - 'C' Mode - K and Custom Sweeps
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • V1MODE_LOGIC_OR_KA

      public static final byte V1MODE_LOGIC_OR_KA
      'Logic' Mode if V1 in USA mode. 'u' mode or 'c' Mode if V1 in Euro Mode. 
       USA Operation (Default):
 - Logic Mode

 European Operation:
 - 'u' Mode - K and Ka(Photo)
 - 'c' Mode - K and Custom Sweeps
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • V1MODE_ADVANCED_LOGIC

      public static final byte V1MODE_ADVANCED_LOGIC
      'Advanced Logic' Mode. Invalid in Euro Mode.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

      public boolean isLaser()

      Returns:
      Returns true if the laser bit and the system status bit is set otherwise, returns false.

      Returns:

    • isTSHoldOff

      public boolean isTSHoldOff()
      Checks if the Time-Slicing Holdoff bit inside of Aux byte 0 is set.
      Returns:
      Returns true if time slicing is not allowed, otherwise false is returned.

    • isSystemStatus

      public boolean isSystemStatus()
      Checks if the System Status bit inside of Aux byte 0 is set.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the V1 is actively searching for Alerts, otherwise false is returned.

    • isDisplayOn

      public boolean isDisplayOn()
      Checks if the Display on bit inside of Aux byte 0 is set.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the V1's display is turned on, otherwise false is returned.

    • isEuroMode

      public boolean isEuroMode()
      Checks if the Euro bit inside of Aux byte 0 is set.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the V1 is operating in Euro mode, otherwise false is returned.

    • isCustomSweep

      public boolean isCustomSweep()
      Checks if the Custom Sweep bit inside of Aux byte 0 is set.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the V1 has custom sweeps defined, otherwise false is returned.

      public boolean isLegacyMode()
      Checks if the Legacy bit inside of Aux byte 0 is set.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the V1 is operating in Legacy Mode, otherwise false is returned.

    • isDisplayActive

      public boolean isDisplayActive()
      Checks if the Display Active bit inside of Aux byte 0 is set. The result of this method is only meaningful on V1 versions V4.1037 and higher.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the display active bit is set, otherwise false is returned.

    • hasActiveAlerts

      public boolean hasActiveAlerts()
      Helper method for determining if the V1 is detecting any active alerts.
      Returns:
      Returns true if there are any active alerts, otherwise false is returned.

    • isDisplayClear

      public boolean isDisplayClear()
      Indicates if the display data represent an empty V1 display. (Not alerting)
      Returns:
      True if the display is clear

    • isError

      public boolean isError()
      Checks if the V1 is currently experiencing an error.
      Returns:
      True if the V1 is displaying an error, otherwise false is returned.

    • isJunk

      public boolean isJunk()
      Checks if the V1 is currently experiencing a Junk out.
      Returns:
      True if the V1 is junking out, otherwise false is returned.

      public boolean isSigningOn()
      Checks if the V1 is currently experiencing a sign-on.
      Returns:
      True if the V1 is experiencing a sign-on, otherwise false is returned.

    • getMode

      public V1Mode getMode()
      Attempts to return the V1 mode stored in the display data Bogey Counter data. If the V1 is alerting mode detection isn't possible because the Bogey Counter bytes indicate the number of detected alerts.
      Returns:
      V1 Mode; V1Mode.Unknown if mode cannot be determined.

    • getBargraphIndicator

      public boolean getBargraphIndicator(@IntRange(from=1L,to=8L) int indicatorIndex)
      Returns whether or not the Bar Graph indicator at indicatorIndex is lit.
      Parameters:
      indicatorIndex - The index of the Bar Graph indicator on the V1 is lit.
      Returns:
      True if the indicator at indicatorIndex is lit otherwise, returns false.

    • getNumberOfLEDS

      public int getNumberOfLEDS()
      Returns the number of LEDS lit on the V1 display.
      Returns:
      The number of lit LEDs on the V1 BarGraph display.

      public String convertToStringImage1()
      Returns the String representation of the seven segment image 1.
      Returns:
      A String representation that a Seven Segment is capable of displaying.
